TITLE: Manage
INFO: The manage oversees all connected encoders. Il allows to manage groups of encoders, start and stop recording, to score points of interest in the video, as well as to schedule timed recordings.

DETAIL.DEVICES_TITLE: List of devices in the group

MANAGEABLE.REMOVE_HISTORIC_ERROR: An error occurred while removing the element from the history (code = {{code}})
MANAGEABLE.REMOVE_HISTORY_ERROR: An error occurred while purging the history (code = {{code}})
MANAGEABLE.BEGIN_DATE_ERROR: Begin date must be after actual date
MANAGEABLE.BEGIN_END_DATES_ERROR: Begin date must be before the end date
MANAGEABLE.CONFLICT_ERROR: A scheduled job is already planned on this time slot
MANAGEABLE.GROUP_CONFLICT_ERROR: A scheduled job is already planned on this time slot for the group

MANAGEABLE.REMOVE_SCHEDULE_ERROR: An error occurred. Removal of the scheduled job could not be performed (code = {{code}})
MANAGEABLE.SCHEDULE_IN_PROGRESS_ERROR: Unable to remove the scheduled job because the recording is in progress

GROUP.ADD_DEVICE_SCHEDULES_COLLISION_ERROR: Impossible to add the encoder "{{deviceName}}" to group "{{groupName}}", schedule jobs between the encoder and the group must not overlap

INPUTS_STATUS.MISSING_PC: This preset requires a functional PC
INPUTS_STATUS.MISSING_PC_AND_CAMERA: This preset requires functional video camera and PC
